SBN (1992-1994)| former_callsigns = | effective_radiated_power = 15 kilowatts| homepage = [http://www.ptni.tv People's Television Network]| }} '''DXNP-TV''', channel 11, is a [[television station]] of [[Philippines|Philippine]] [[television network]] [[People's Television Network]] in [[Davao City]]. Its studio is located at Shrine Hills, Matina, [[Davao City]], while it's transmitter is located at JP Cabaguio Ave., Agdao, [[Davao City]]. == Current personalities == * Ethel Cantor-Constantino {{Metro Davao TV}} {{NBN Mindanao}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Dxnp-Tv}} [[Category:Television in Davao City]] [[Category:NBN stations]] {{Philippines-tv-stub}} [[bcl:DXNP-TV]] [[ceb:DXNP-TV]] [[cbk-zam:DXNP-TV]] [[ms:DXNP-TV]] [[tl:DXNP-TV]]
